caption.p: Antennal response of newly emerged worker (white boxes, n = 6 bees) and forager (grey boxes, n = 7 bees) honey bees to six T. vulgaris terpenes including their acetates. Shown are medians with 25–75% ( box) and min-max range ( whisker). (Black dots are single bee data points, representing a single antenna tested per substance).
